description:
Shinkai Haru is an ordinary first year in middle school. But one day, the search app Appmon, Gatchmon, jumps out of his phone! Who`d have thought that there were App Monsters living inside your smartphone?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kensaku Kekka wa Shinkai Haru! Gacchimon Arawaru!
Search Result: Shinkai Haru! Gatchmon Appears!
検索結果は新海ハル! ガッチモンあらわる!
